lessons.japanese: 少年はクイズを解くのにかなり苦労した。
lessons.indonesian: The boy took great pains to solve the quiz.

lessons.japanese: その少年はそのクイズを解くのに骨を折った。
lessons.indonesian: The boy took great pains to solve the quiz.

lessons.japanese: このクイズは全然分からない。
lessons.indonesian: I can make nothing of this quiz.

lessons.japanese: クイズ番組は７時のニュースのあとだ。
lessons.indonesian: The quiz show follows the 7 o'clock news.

lessons.japanese: 彼にとってそのクイズに答えることは簡単だった。
lessons.indonesian: It was easy for him to answer the quiz.

lessons.japanese: 少年はクイズを解くのにかなり苦労した。
lessons.indonesian: The boy took great pains to solve the quiz.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは昨晩、テレビでクイズショーを楽しんだ。
lessons.indonesian: We enjoyed the quiz show on television last night.

lessons.japanese: その少年はそのクイズを解くのに骨を折った。
lessons.indonesian: The boy took great pains to solve the quiz.

lessons.japanese: このクイズは全然分からない。
lessons.indonesian: I can make nothing of this quiz.

lessons.japanese: クイズ番組は７時のニュースのあとだ。
lessons.indonesian: The quiz show follows the 7 o'clock news.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは昨晩、テレビでクイズショーを楽しんだ。
lessons.indonesian: We enjoyed the quiz show on television last night.

lessons.japanese: 彼にとってそのクイズに答えることは簡単だった。
lessons.indonesian: It was easy for him to answer the quiz.

lessons.japanese: あまりにも難しいクイズ番組なのに、賞金は意外と低い。
lessons.indonesian: Even though it is an unnecessarily difficult quiz show, the prize money is surprisingly little.

lessons.japanese: あまりにも難しいクイズ番組なのに、賞金は意外と低い。
lessons.indonesian: Even though it is an unnecessarily difficult quiz show, the prize money is surprisingly little.
